column1: Luke Ronchi is gone first ball! Full just outside off, and Ronchi goes for an expansive cover drive. Thick outside edge, and pouched by first slip diving to his right. What a start for LQ! A golden duck for Luke Ronch, would you believe it
full on off, and he crunches a drive from near his toes. Through to cover point on the bounce
full onm off, and he prods forward before driving with the bat's open face through cover! Damn, this outfield is fasttttt
length ball, angling away after landing on off. He pushes at this off the back foot, and edges it down to third man

full on off, and he looks to drive straight. But the ball jags in, takes an inside edge, and flies across to the leg side. Enough muscle behind Delport's swing, that it goes through to the square-leg boundary
drilled past the bowler! Overpitched on off, and he offers the bat's full face to drill a four past Shaheen's right. Mid-off can't cut it off either
clattered over cover! Length ball on middle, angling away from Salt, and he throws his hands at this. Slices a shot, right over the infield, and the Qalandars fielders don't bother moving
length ball on off, and jagging away after pitching. Tries to flat-bat a shot through the off side, but under-edges it towards mid off
full on leg, and he tries to nudge it fine. Padded towards short fine leg, as they pinch a single in the process. Umpire gives it as runs though
punched! Length ball moving away from Delport, and he rides the bounce to firmly strike this through the off side
muscled! And that's the day's first six. Full on middle, and Delport walks across to the off side, before slapping this over midwicket!
length ball, just wide outside off, and cut fine past short third man! Expensive
full on off, and the googly spins inwards. Defended off the front foot

full and wide outside off, and Salt takes a huge step towards the ball. Tries to lift it over cover, but he's toe-ended the shot in the air. Mid-off gets under it, and makes no mistake! Sandeep strikes right away!
full on leg, and the googly comes into his pads. Tucked away to short fine leg

nearly caught and bowled! Length ball on leg, and Delport tries to play this with the straight bat. Struck straight back to Sandeep, and the ball hits him flush on the boot before he can get his hands to it
half-tracker on middle, and turning towards off stump. He rocks back, and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball on middle, and the wrong'un goes down Walton's leg side. Keeper can't hold on to it either, and the ball runs away to the boundary. Is that a wide? Nope, grazed Walton's thighs
full on middle, and angling into his pads. Delport closes his bat's face, and whips this right over short fine leg!

full just outside off, and Delport has gone for a golf swing. Tries to smack this over long-on, but the shot has been toe-ended. In the air for ages, and Sohail Akhtar runs towards the boundary from midwicket, but the ball pops out of his hand, and Delport survives. Dropped!
low full toss on off, and he drills a straight drive to mid-off
short! Fast and precise on off, and Delport ducks to take cover

hammered! And this one has been timed beautifully. Ball hits the digital scorecard. Full on off, but Delport makes room, and opens his stance, before clobbering this (baseball-style) over long on. Wowza
back of a length on off, and Delport swivels to pull the ball. Top-edged but without enough power, and the ball soars over deep square leg. Fifty up in 24 balls!
juicy full toss! And Walton makes no mistake. Nicely flighted, and the lack of pace allows Walton to get a big bat swing into his shot, and he smacks this over the bowler's head for a maximum
length ball on off, and the googly comes inwards. Too close to Walton's body, but he cuts to point anyway
length ball on off, and he punches this googly down to long on for a single
length ball on off, and turning into Delport. Clipped off the back foot to square leg

spin! Full on off, and turning away from Delport. He tried to clobber this straight, but the ball whizzes past his outside edge. Keeper can't grab on to it either, and the ball rolls away to short third man after hitting his glove
full outside off, and Walton takes a big stride forward to block Lamichhane's final ball
length ball on off, and angling into Delport's pads. Rolls his wrists over this pull shot, and the ball has gone to the leg-side fence
length ball on off, and angling inwards again. Punched off the back foot to mid-off
length ball on middle, and sliding in again. Delport goes deep into his crease, and hammers a back-foot punch to long on
length ball, just outside off, and no real spin into Walton. Struck off the back foot to long on for a walking single
length ball, wide outside off, but coming in with the bowler's arm. Struck off the back foot to cover
length ball on off, and Delport opens his stance, before punching to midwicket for a single
full-ish on middle, and angling away from the left-hander. Clubbed to cover, and the fielder has a shy at the non-striker's stumps. He misses, and the batsman get one overthrow runs
length ball, wide outside off, and cut off the back foot to third man for a single
flicked! Length ball, outside leg stump, and he closes his bat's face to exquisitely flick this past short fine leg. Gets to fifty in no time!
full on off, and he tries to drive straight to mid-off. Mistimed, and that allows them to take a single
full on middle, and nudged off his pads behind the square-leg umpire. They scamper across for one
waist-high full toss on off, and that's been tapped off the back foot to cover. Delport asks the height question, and the umpire says it's legal
half-tracker on middle from around the wicket. Pulled along the ground to deep square leg
full outside leg, from around the wicket, and he gets down on one knee, before sweeping past short fine leg. Fifty partnership!
length ball outside off, and skidding away. Walton mistimes a cut-shot to cover point
once again, same channel outside off, and this time the cut is hit past the infield to deep extra cover
skiddy ball, full outside off, and driven to the fielder at cover
length ball, outside off, and steered off the back foot towards point. Soft hands, and that means Delport can safely run across for one
slower ball, short on off, and he muscles a cut past the fielder at cover. He gets a hand to it, thereby slowing the ball's pace
length ball on off, and angling in. Nudged off his pads to the vacant mid-wicket region
full on off, and he mistimes a straight drive to long off for a single
full on off, and mistimed to long on
back of a length on leg, cramping Delport for space, and punched towards deep midwicket for a single
short, wide outside off, and a bit of tennis-ball bounce over Walton. He looks for the wide, but umpire Gough says that's fine. Drinks break
reverse swept through the infield! Full on leg, but he picked the googly early, and pierces the tiny gap between short third man and point
length ball on leg, and the googly is punched off the back foot to long on
slider outside off, and Walton cuts off the back foot to short third man
length ball on off, and the ball that's sliding inwards is punched off the back foot to long on
full on off, and Delport settles down on one knee, before slog sweeping over deep midwicket! What power. Amazing way to get Islamabad past triple digits!
length ball on middle, and spinning away from Delport. Tapped back to the bowler
attempted yorker but it comes as a low full toss. Slices a drive to deep extra cover
another attempted yorker, that's been toe-ended down to mid-off for a single
knee-high full toss, and punched straight back into the non-striker's stumps! Breaks the wicket before dribbling away to mid-off. They run across for one
full on off, and he swings across the line towards the leg side. Mistimed to deep midwicket
back of a length on middle, and he gloves a pull right over the keeper Riki Wessels! A good ball, and Walton rides on a bit of luck
length ball on off, and tapped off the back foot to cover. They scamper across for a single. Nine off the over.
full on middle, and going down the leg side. Walton looks to flick this towards fine leg, but can't get the connection
up and over extra cover! Length ball outside off, and Walton dances down the wicket, before connecting well with an uppish drive. Gets enough behind that shot to go the distance. 72 metres
slower ball, full on off, and caressed down the ground to long on for a walking single
slapped! Length ball angling across, and Delport leans into his cut-shot. Muscled square past point, and the man in the deep has no chance
overpitched on off, and he absolutely hammers a check-drive down to long off
back of a length, wide outside off, and the ball bounces over Walton's head. Umpire takes his time, before calling it a wide
full on off, and driven to long on
full and wide outside off, and slices to deep midwicket
full on leg, and he tries to slog this towards deep midwicket. Inside-edged onto his pads, and they scamper across for a single
low full toss on off, and driven to mid-off. The fielder takes aim at the stumps, and hits the non striker's stumps! Walton was in though
waist-high full toss on off, and he slices a shot on the off side. Finds the gap between cover and mid-off, and that's another four. Delport asks for a height no-ball but the umpire isn't interested
yorker outside leg, and he taps a drive to mid-off
slower ball, back of a length on off, and he's cramped for space. Mistimes a pull, straight to midwicket
length ball, wide outside off, and punched to cover for a single
clean as a whistle! Full outside off, and he drags a slogged shot over wide long on! Picks the slower ball early, and hammers this into orbit
low full toss but Walton flicks this over deep midwicket anyway! A proper swing of the bat, and even that mistimed shot has gone over the boundary. Carnage. Run-rate over 11 right now
yorker, just outside off, and driven to long-off for a single
length ball, on off, and cut away to point. Mistimed though. Islamabad reach 150

middle stump gone! Walton misses his half-century. Yorker on middle, and Walton goes across the stumps to play a cheeky sweep. He can't connect, and the ball pegs middle stump back. Relief for Lahore after a long time. End of the 118-run partnership
slow and full outside off, tentatively driven to cover. Wiese's spell: 1-44
full outside off, and clobbered over the bowler's head! Welcomes Rahat for his second spell with a four. Ball fell just short of the boundary-foam at long-off
slower ball, full toss on middle, and lifted over Rahat. Falls a couple of metres short of long off
full outside off, and angling further away. He goes for an expansive drive, but can't get bat on ball
full outside off, and he goes to drive this over cover. Slices the shot over point instead, and falls short of the fielder near the boundary

full toss on leg stump, and he offers the bat's straight face to check-punch. Driven over Rahat's head, and the bowler ducks under it to take cover. Good decision, that was struck hard. Long-off cleans up
low full toss outside off, and he drags a shot over the non-striker's head. Falls in no man's land
full outside off, and Asif picks the legbreak well. Down on one knee, and smacked over the bowler's head
full on off, and he gets down on one knee to swing across the line. Hit so hard that it clears the backward square fence. Lamichhane getting hammered

that's hundred for Delport! Raises his bat after getting there, and Asif runs to hug him. Full on off, and the googly has been slogged over deep midwicket. Big punch in the air too. He's enjoyed this knock
full on leg, and he reverse sweeps. Ball hits his pad and rolls away to short third man. Safe, because impact's outside leg stump
Asif joins the party! Full on off, and he clears his front leg, before absolutely hammering this six over long on. What a shot. Lamichhane concedes 46 in 4!
back of a length just outside off, and it's a slower ball. Delport drags a pull to deep midwicket
full on off, and the ball angles away from Asif. Tries to go for an expansive drive over cover, but the ball goes past his outside edge
full outside off, and he opens the bat's face, and plays a square drive. Flies off the bat's edge, and races away to the backward-point fence
tees off! Full on middle, but the slower ball is picked early. Front leg cleared, and ball's been hammered over cow corner
full on off, and he plays an inside-out drive to deep extra cover
full toss, wide outside off, and slapped to deep point
overpitched, wide outside off, and going further away. Umpire says that's wide
length ball, wide outside off, and Delport backs away to make some room. Ball goes just inside the tramlines, so the umpire says that's a 'fair ball'
lucky! Full outside off, and he backs away to hammer this over cover. Thick outside edge past the keeper's left, and third man can't cut it off either. Fifty partnership already!

full on off, and he drills this straight back to the bowler. Rauf collects, and has a shy at the batsman's stumps, but the ball hits Delport near his glutes. Rauf apologises right away, and the umpire has a chat with the bowler. Not sure why he was aiming at the stumps in the first place. Delport was well in. Frustration, perhaps?
he responds with a four! Full and wide outside off, and he slaps this through the covers! Races away for four
length ball on off, and he drills this down to long on
full on middle, but swinging down leg. Flicked to short fine leg, and Delport's running towards the dangerous end. Direct hit from the fielder, but Delport's in
sweeeeeeeeeet Full on off, and he check-drives a shot right past Delport! Long-on tries to dive and stop, but his effort is futile
slower ball, length on off, and Asif Ali simply flat-bats this shot over long on! Picks the change-up so well
full on middle, and he check-punches a shot over long on! Pure timing, no brute force this time. Proper bat swing, and then he allows the bat's face to do the rest. Jabbed over long on. Carnage.
full and wide outside off, and he drills a flat-batted cut to deep point
yorker on middle, a good comeback delivery. Dug away to the off side
full and wide outside off,and Delport makes some room, before thick-edging a cut over to deep point. Shaheen concedes 62 in his four overs
full and wide outside off, and he drags a shot to wide long on for a single
knee-high full toss, and whipped over square leg! Muscled to the leg side, and the 62metre six gets him the record for joint-fastest half-century in the PSL
play and a miss. Full and wide outside off, and the attempted leg-side slog is missed
back of a length on middle, and Asif ducks under this. No wide given!
yorker on leg, and flicked beautifully past deep backward square! Races across the grass for another four
back of a length on middle, and he tries to pull. Hit in the air, and straight to deep midwicket, but that's been dropped by Agha Salman, and Islamabad finish on 238 for 3!
length ball on off, and angling in slightly. Slapped away to point. The innings starts with a dot
length ball on off, and he drags a pull through to cow corner! Comes off the bat's inside splice, but Fakhar will take it. The bat's broken too! New blade, please!
ramped but only to short fine leg. Full on off, and he shuffles across the stumps to lift it over the infield. Ball doesn't go where he desired
length ball, wide outside off, and the attempted cut is mistimed to point
full and wide outside off, and the attempted drive takes a thick outside edge over the vacant slip cordon! Flies away for a one-bounce four
full and wide outside off, and the attempted cover drive is toe-ended towards the off side
full on off, and he clears his front leg, before clobbering this over the fielder at midwicket!
ramped over short fine leg! Full on off, and Fakhar goes across the stumps, before Marillier-ing this over the infield. Clears the rope too
slower ball, length ball on leg, and Fakhar has all the time to swivel and pull. Clears the backward-square boundary!
full, on off stump, and thumped off the back foot to mid-off
length ball, on off, and Fakhar goes for a wild pull. Takes a top-edge but Fakhar's bat-speed ensures it goes over the keeper's head for half-a-dozen. What is happening tonight?!
overpitched on off, and Fakhar drills a cover drive through the off side! Poor effort from the fielder at cover, whose diving effort should've stopped the ball. Massive over. Musa concedes 26!
slower ball, full toss just outside off, and Devcich toe-ends a leg-side slog over midwicket, and the ball nearly goes for a six!
full just outside off, and he digs this down to mid-off. No run there, but they manage to scamper across for one
full just outside leg stump, and Fakhar shuffles across to ramp this again. Misses the shot, though, and the ball nearly clips leg stump
full on off, and he hammers a shot down to mid-off. No chance of a run there
full on off, and he digs this from the blockhole. Ball rolls away to cover as the batsmen pinch a single
slow full toss on off, and he slices a drive to mid-off for a quick single
full and wide outside off, and Devcich comes down the wicket before slicing a shot over extra cover! Clears the boundary with ease. As easy as ABC
slower ball, wide outside off, and Devcich tries to smack this through the off side. Totally deceived by the lack of pace. The 110kph ball goes through to Ronchi
length ball on off, and he mistimes a pulled shot to deep midwicket
length ball, just outside off, and he steers a shot to point for a single. Fifty up for Lahore in just 22 balls
low full toss on off, and he drills a drive down to mid-on
slower ball, full and wide outside off, and he mistimes a slapped-shot to cover
full and wide outside off, and he gets down on one knee, before hammering a shot to cover. Can't clear the infield

full and wide outside off, and he makes room to lift this over cover. Toe-ends the shot, and it's been easily taken by cover. Too wide for Devcich to even try the shot. There's the first wicket for Islamabad!
length ball on off, and skidding inwards. Nudged to square leg for a quick single. Off the mark straightaway
length ball on middle, and going towards the offside. Fakhar shuffles across to ramp again, but the ball is not full enough for it. Through to Ronchi at some real good place
full on off, and he swings across the line. But the ball takes a thick outside edge and beats the fielder at third man for four! Fakhar will take it
back of a length on off, and he goes for a pull. Ball stays slighty low, and goes over off stump to Ronchi. Just five runs off that over. Priceless
length ball on leg stump, and skidding through. Tries to flick towards the leg side, but the ball hits his knee roll

slower blal, full on off, and he times this straight drive well. Just past the bowler's left, and mid-on runs to his left to slide and stop the ball. Parries it towards mid-off, but saves the boundary
back of a length, wide outside off, and the cut-shot finds the fielder at point
yorker on leg, and he inside-edges a shot right into his boots. Ball rolls away to the off side
length ball, wide outside off, and he drags this slower ball in front of midwicket! Ball dribbles away to the leg-side fence for four. Well improvised by Wessels!
yorker angling into leg stump, and flicked off his toes to deep midwicket. No ball though so that's a free-hit
full on middle, and he drills a shot to mid-on. Dot
length ball on off, and he splices a pull to midwicket

length ball on off, and he tries to flat-bat a shot over long on. Toe-ends the shot, and that's been taken by the long-on fielder sliding in! He claims it's 'out' but the umpires want to check. They ask Fakhar to wait. Soft signal 'out'. Big moment in the game as we wait for the TV umpire. Replays suggest that the fielder had his hands under the ball while sliding in from long-on. Looks ominous for Fakhar... and yep, he's got to go! Superb high-pressure catch by Salt, and Fakhar's 20-ball innings comes to a close
length ball on off, and cramped for space. Wessels looks to punch towards the off side, but the shot's been inside-edged to the fine-leg boundary!
low full toss on leg stump, and he hammers a shot to wide long-on for a single
length ball on off, and angling away. Haris tries to steer this fine, but the ball goes past his outside edge

length ball on off, and he tries to cut this square. But Asif at point leaps up in the air and picks out a catch from over his head! Excellent fielding on display by the Islamabad fielders, and that's a double-blow for Lahore
length ball from Shadab, and that's been pulled over deep midwicket! Fielder was near the boundary but the ball goes just over Walton. Risky
full outside leg, and Wessels tries to sweep. Misses, and that's a wide
faster one, full outside off, and the drive has been misfielded by cover. They take a single
full on leg stump, and nudged off his toes to midwicket
full on off, and he drives for the ball that comes inwards. But the legbreak turns away, and the ball has pegged back off stump! Classical legspinner's wicket
wrong'un, lands full on middle, and turning into his pads. Misses the leg-side flick
googly to finish the over. Full outside off, and driven to short cover
back of a length ball on off, and he rides the bounce to punch to mid off. Fielder tries to aim at the bowler's end, but that causes some overthrow runs
back of a length on off, and he rides the bounce well, before pulling a shot-arm jab over midwicket! Flies away to the boundary
full on middle, and furiously flicked past the fielder at short fine leg! Four more for Lahore
length ball too close to off stump. Tries to cut square, but not a good shot-option given there was no room. Through to Ronchi
length ball on middle, and he slices a shot to point for a quick single
back of a length on off, cramping Wiese for room. Flicked to square leg, and he gets off the mark. RRR: 13.45
extra flight, so full toss just outside off. Punched down to long off for a single
full on off, and he lifts this over cover. Doesn't have the power to find the boundary though. Rolls away to deep extra cover
flatter, wide outside off, and cut square to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
flighted wide outside off, and he goes for an expansive drive. Slices it over point, and Faheem - at deep point - can't cut it off despite an acrobatic effort in the deep
full and fast, nearly at the base of off stump. Sohail needs to adjust, by reducing his bat swing. Inside-edged onto his pads
flighted full outside off, and Sohail gets down on one knee, before clobbering a six into the sightscreen! Classy way to get your team hundred!
full and wide outside off, and he gets his bat down with the open face, and guides a shot to the backward-point boundary!
length ball angling in, and the leg-side flick comes off his pads. They scamper across for a single
length ball on middle, and nudged off his pads to deep midwicket for a walking single
length ball on off, and angling in. Nudged off his pads to the midwicket region. Played so softly that they can actually steal a second run
full on leg, and he shuffles across to paddle this over short fine leg. Can't connect!
length ball, just wide outside off, and punched to cover for a quick single
full, just outside off, and he tries to drive over cover. Misses because of the legbreak
full on leg, and he clears his front leg, before smashing a six over long on! Straight over the fielder
full on middle, and the ball turns further away from Sohail. Tries to muscle towards the leg side, but misses
length ball, wide outside off, and he flat-bats a hammered shot past the non-striker to the long-off fence!
length ball, on off, and punched to long off
full on leg, and flicked to short fine leg for a single. Another no-ball from Rumman
back of a length on middle, and the attempted pull has been gloved over the keeper's head! He's lucky that didn't go for six, given how the day has gone for the bowlers. Fifty partnership too!
slower ball, full on off, and he whips this down to long-on for a single

slower ball, on off, and he tries to lift this over long off. Deceived by the slower ball, and Sami - at cover - makes no mistake! Rumman hasn't overstepped either. Wiese falls, life gets more difficult for Lahore. Wiese's struggling innings finally comes to a close
back of a length on leg, and Sohail doesn't even duck, and the ball goes over his head
full on leg, and that's been clipped over deep backward square. Sohail moves on to 46. Power generated from the wrist
length ball on off, and going further away. Tries to cut, but deceived by the (lack of) pace
back of a length on off, and angling away again. Tries to cut, but misses again. Two dots to end the over

length ball, we outside off, and the googly spins inwards. Tries to cut square, but the ball goes through to Ronchi. Shadab thinks that's been under-edged, but Ronchi isn't sure. They choose not to review
full on middle, and the leg-side whip takes a leading edge to cover
full and fast on off, and he drills a straight drive to long on
full on leg stump, from around the wicket. Nudged off his boots to square leg
full and wide outside off, and he comes down the wicket to clear the boundary. Mistimed to long on
full outside off, and turning further away. Sohail tries to drag a sweep from outside the stumps, but he misses
back of a length, short and wide outside off, and Sohail can't connect with the cut. Through to Ronchi
length ball, just outside off, and he walks across to the off side before pulling to deep midwicket

length ball angling into his body, and he check-pulls towards the leg side. Doesn't have the distance, and Shadab - running in from deep midwicket - times his run well and takes a running catch. Fourth wicket for Faheem!
slapped! And that's fifty for Sohail. No celebration though. Lot's of work for Sohail. Length ball outside off, and cut fairly hard
back of a length on off, and he mistimes a leg-side clip for a single. 150 for LQ
length ball, wide outside off, and that's been hammered over deep midwicket for six! Rides the bounce well, and smacks it for a biggie
length ball, wide outside off, and he uppishly drives over cover! Just about clears the infielder
full on leg, and he misses the leg-side clip. Ball rolls away to short fine leg, and Sami wants to review the lbw call. Nah, this is going down leg. Islamabad lose a review
yorker, just outside off, and Shaheen can't get bat on ball. Through to Ronchi
full toss, wide outside off, and slapped to point. Can't beat the infield
nearly a yorker on leg, and he drills to long on. Can take a single, but Sohail says no. That means Sohail will have the strike next over
full, slower ball, but outside leg stump. Needs to rebowl
full and wide outside off, and he drags a flat-batted shot over the bowler. Long-on intercepts
slower ball, wide outside off, and he tries to go for a big heave towards the leg side. Misses
yorker, on off, and wedged away to the leg side for a single
back of a length, on leg stump, but he swivels to pull over deep backward square! Moves into the 70s
yorker on leg, and clipped past short fine leg! Another boundary.
slower ball on leg, and nudged to square leg for a single

back of a length, outside off, and pulled to wide long on! Faheen takes five wickets! And he becomes the joint-highest wickettaker this season. Sohail's valiant innings comes to an end, and for what it's worth, this is perhaps the end of Lahore's attempt at chasing 239
full on off, and he goes for a leg-side heave. Misses altogether
that's Faheem's sixth! Yorker on middle, and Shaheen attempts to dig this away, but the ball clatters into the base of the stumps. What an evening he's having
full on middle, and tapped away to point
full on middle, and the front-foot defense takes an inside edge into his pads
length ball on leg, and squared away to point. Faheem finishes with 6/19. Crazy figures on a day where we've seen more than 400 runs scored
full on middle, and he goes for a big swing towards the leg side. Inside-edged onto his body
full on off, and he digs this away to cover
my my my! Full on off, and he skips down the wicket, before hammering a six over the bowler's head!
back of a length on leg, and he tries to pull. Misses
low full toss on middle, and he clatters this down to long on

comedy of errors! Yorker on leg, and the ball has been inside-edged onto his toes. Batsman tries to go for a single since he doesn't know where the ball is. Musa picks the ball up, and tries to whip the bails off (at the batsman's end), but he loses his balance and drops the ball. Seeing that, the batsman tries to run again, but this time Musa controls his running, takes an aim at the stumps, and gets a direct-hit! Wow
back of a length outside off, and he misses a shot over extra cover
full and wide outside off, and drilled to deep extra cover. They come back for a rare two
low full toss just outside off, and he drags a slogged shot to wide long on
slower ball, length delivery outside off, and he misses the flat-batted shot. Through to the keeper
full on middle, and drilled to long on
length ball, wide outside off, and he drags a pull to deep midwicket. Islamabad United win by 49 runs!
